mapper.select: SELECT TIF.TITLE_NAME , TIM.ICORN_FILE_PATH , TIM.ICORN_FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME , TIM.ICORN_FILE_MASKING_NAME FROM HAVE_TITLE HTT JOIN TITLE_INFO TIF ON HTT.TITLE_SEQ = TIF.TITLE_SEQ JOIN TITLE_IMG TIM ON TIF.TITLE_CODE = TIM.TITLE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND HTT.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(TIF.TITLE_CODE) AS COUNT , TIF.TITLE_NAME AS TITLE_NAME , HTT.USER_ID AS USER_ID FROM TITLE_INFO TIF LEFT JOIN HAVE_TITLE HTT ON HTT.TITLE_SEQ = TIF.TITLE_SEQ AND USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY TIF.TITLE_CODE
SELECT user_id , title_seq , get_title FROM have_title WHERE 1=1 AND user_id = #{user_id} AND title_seq = #{title_seq}
SELECT USER_ID AS USER_ID , COUNT(TITLE_SEQ) AS COUNT FROM HAVE_TITLE WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO have_title (user_id, title_seq, get_title) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title_seq}, #{get_title})
